doc.title: A Dream of Red Mansions
doc.plot: Inspired by a true story, A DREAM OF RED MANSIONS is an epic tale of love and courage, set against the background of the Chinese cultural revolution. When American photo-journalist Diana Mellors travels to war-torn China in 1949, she is catapulted into a whole new world - a Communist one - just as Mao Zedong assumes control of the nation and declares the People's Republic of China. )
